website_summaries.verdict: If you can get over the initial investment, this metal detector is the best option for adventurers.
pros: Senses a wide range of metal types
cons: The ability to hunt for metal anywhere makes it a pricy model

customer_reviews.title: Batteries
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in proper packaging. During inspection found batteries were dead and in case of the detector. Recommend the batteries not be stored in unit, and be packaged separate , because they may leak and cause damage. Installed new batteries unit turned on as required. Pin pointer batteries were also installed in unit. They are in good charge. Also recommend packaged separate.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: Update- this honestly was my favorite metal detector until a 2months gone by and the detector is malfunctioning, the numbers are going everywhere and beeping when there is no metal present. I had it returned back to garrett for a repair and I've i recieved it once again being defective. im disappointed in what I thought was the greatest metal detector out there.....Old review -have to say this is one of those accurate metal detectors of them all. Definently recommend buying. My favorite is the pinpointed function and God dang it's accurate
customer_reviews.author: Travis.k

customer_reviews.title: Jumpy vdi and chatters
customer_reviews.text: Unit was bad. The vdi jumped all over the place even with a low sensitivity setting. Had static noises.. changed batteries lowered sensitivity and checked the coil wire and still no help. I could actually wave my bare hand with no metal jewelry on and the detector would respond. It responded if a leaf bumped the coil. I'm sorry I cant pay 722 dollars on an item that dont work correctly
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and loaded!
customer_reviews.text: Husband has had another very expensive brand for years. His last detector finally was no longer fixable so I started shopping for a Christmas gift replacement. All my research brought me to Garrett and for half the price! When I received it I had problems accepting it was good enough just because it was much easier to use, hold, carry as really light! Husband is thrilled and with our weather here just hasn't had a good day to really test it out yet. Will update once he does but looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Not a toy! It takes work to learn.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first metal detector and it’s definitely not a toy! It will take some work to get familiar with all the features. I dug up a lot of screws and nails until I went back and watched the instruction videos several more times. Now I am beginning to understand how to tell if something is probable iron trash using the iron audio feature and the iron discrim feature. The instruction videos were key in helping me understand. I suggest watching videos 2&3 before the first few time you go out. Seeding a sandbox or other clean area with good & bad targets is a great way to practice.
customer_reviews.author: Moore

customer_reviews.title: Watched Videos several times to learn the settings to use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Garrett AT Max for my wife. I own a Garrett AT Gold and really like it. So far, she is running in Coin Mode and loves the Wireless Headphones. She is learning how to use this unit and is having a blast finding coins at city parks. I bought her a Lesche 18 inch digging shovel (I have a 36 inch shovel). She uses it more than the Whites Digging Spade. She does love the Digging Spade too. I recommend the Garrett AT Max for anyone that is interested in Metal Detecting.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Smith

customer_reviews.title: More good targets faster digging
customer_reviews.text: Very nice up grade from my old 5900 sl pro They are in need of quality control could not get the tubes together. After an hour of sanding and greasing the inside female tube they went together. I was thinking why am I going this after spending all that money. But I love the at max great pinpointer too now I know the difference between the $30 pinpointed an the one in this set no comparison buy it !
customer_reviews.author: Frank Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to MD but chose the AT Max based on reviews and comps. Didn't want a toy. There are plenty of YouTube AT Max instruction videos that got me up and running successfully on my first hunt. Still a lot to learn but if you are serious about doing anything, do it right! AT Max!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Love my Garrett AT Max
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Garrett AT Max detector. The headphones are amazing and I’ve never used any before this purchase and overall I absolutely love it. Right out of the box it was easy to put together. Took me some getting used to on the different settings with it being more advanced than my starter detector. Pin pointer works like a charm as well. First time with this unit as well and I absolutely could not be happier of my purchase. Very happy customer! Can’t wait to get back out hunting again
customer_reviews.author: Eric H.

customer_reviews.title: Have fun with your hobbies
customer_reviews.text: Product is confusing to use and hard to set up ,and understand what it is detecting batteries don’t last that long for me i was able to use it for 2 days of detecting before replacing the batteries
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: The best yet
customer_reviews.text: I love the wireless features. And the AT Max finds even more than my AT Pro
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Lokken

customer_reviews.title: High quality machine at a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I started metal detecting when I was younger and recently got back into it. The machine I was using was from the mid-late eighties. This machine blows that one away. It's fairly easy to use once you know how the machine operates. I honestly go out two to three times a week because I love the machine that much. I was worried I wouldn't like this machine, but once I actually used it and understood how it worked, I fell in love.
customer_reviews.author: TLeeOneThree

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today , within an hour I scored a 1930s calvin coolidge token in my back yard . Easy assembly Simple to use . Thanks garrett 😉
customer_reviews.author: kenwould

customer_reviews.title: Love the wireless technology
customer_reviews.text: Found a hundred year old buffalo nickel in my own back yard first time out using and learning
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garrett makes a quality machine
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine had been using the Ace 400 and thought it was time to move up. I have been happy so far but am still learning and fine tuning. The Z-Link is awesome i recommend that to everyone whit whatever machine, My friend just bought a Fisher F75 and got the Z-Link for it and loves it as well.
customer_reviews.author: sgMichigan1

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine Even for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Totally happy with this. It is easy to use as long as you follow directions and there are Videos on you tube by Garrett that help in tuning the machine in even better. I have had no problems on beaches with ground balance. It has great depth I have dug small items 10" down which is pretty awesome for me!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a step up from my AT Pro
customer_reviews.text: This detector seems to be even more accurate than the ATPro I've been using. The wireless headphones are so much better than having the wired ones. It's got some more complex features that aren't too hard to figure out but are nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Shriner

customer_reviews.title: Use caution. Pre-owned came instead of new!
customer_reviews.text: I opened the package to find items were already opened and missing a part. I’m returning and hoping for the correct item refund
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Eiden

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Built
customer_reviews.text: This detector is very well built. So much so that it is on the heavy side. Noticably heavier than my ACE 250. However, I couldn't be happier with the performance. Give yourself time to really learn the times and it will greatly improved you recovery. I've seen some complaints about difficulty changing batteries but it isn't too bad. Being totally waterproof is worth the battery effort. The headphones aren't waterproof but otherwise great. Headphone battery life is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Foos

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great machine! You get what you pay for in products like this. Garrett has produced some of the best detectors for years and I could not be happier with my AT max! Watch YouTube to get an idea of the capabilities and make an informed purchase.
customer_reviews.author: William R.

customer_reviews.title: I Love my AT Max
customer_reviews.text: The AT max seems to run as little hotter than the AT Pro. I usually have to turn the sensitivity down 3 notches to get rid of the chatter. It slso ferls just s little heavier than the Pro. In all-metal mode with a concentric coil, this thing can go DEEP.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: This was a big step up for me in a metal detector and I have found it easy to assemble, easy to use and really like being able to determine the different types of metals
customer_reviews.author: Drea

customer_reviews.title: Best package on the market!
customer_reviews.text: This setup is fantastic! We are really having fun finding all kinds of things. This PRO MAX model does it all, tells you the difference between metals, depths and more.
customer_reviews.author: Terry O. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Solid detector!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Simple and reliable. I really like this detector! Used it in Creek beds with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Otto

customer_reviews.title: Awesome detector!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome unit. It just takes some learning and paying attention to details. It's best to find someone to help you.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Walsh

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived as stated. Packaging was ok (box in a box, flopping around a bit). Assembled it, detected my yards to start getting used to it. Found about a buck in change. Damn sensitive unit compared to others. This one will take more learning and getting used to, than other units.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Wozny

customer_reviews.title: Great equipment
customer_reviews.text: Wow, easy to set up and get right to work! Already ordered a bunch of other support items. Found an antique buncher ring in the first hour!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Little pricey but worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Ive wanted one forever. Finally bought my first detector and it was the AT MAX. Awesome detector.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin H Samuels

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, headphones make it waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality wireless headphones work perfectly salt water beach freshwater anywhere very quickly ground balances itself to cut out excess noise
customer_reviews.author: c. n. Ballinger

customer_reviews.title: Garrett AT Max
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice machine, excellent depth and the wireless headphones and pin pointer are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great Metal Detector
customer_reviews.text: Using it to locate items lost on the farm implements and land markers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: The Box came crush and soaken wet battery plastic case broken
customer_reviews.author: Brian seese

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic machine.
customer_reviews.text: Garrett has done a fantastic job with this machine. Love the wireless headphones. If you like metal detecting you will like this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Found lots of treasures so far. Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: The greatest metal detector on Earth. Stop shopping now and buy it. I Absolutely Satisfied..
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Smith

customer_reviews.title: How to set for proper operation
customer_reviews.text: Owners manual helpful but still a lot of details and technical things to absorb all at once for proper operation
customer_reviews.author: f m byers

customer_reviews.title: My favorite machine.
customer_reviews.text: Great detector! Easy to learn to use and even a beginner should figure it out fast.
customer_reviews.author: Emy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I like that so far it works with no problems!
customer_reviews.author: Uncle pauly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. works great for finding things the kids lose in the yard!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great detector
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited to get this and the pointer in and have already found several items with it. It will pick up items down to two ft so far
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan oliver

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: What a deal couldn't be happier now on to me pot of gold!
customer_reviews.author: Rob B.

customer_reviews.title: Read the Instructions
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine, but still have some learning to do before I can operate it properly.
customer_reviews.author: Darla J Pair

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This metal detector is so awesome and easy to use. I have much confidence in this equipment and have learned so much from it. I use it in rivers and land.
customer_reviews.author: Suzan Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Love this model
customer_reviews.text: Wa Ted to upgrade from an older one I had, was very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: G
customer_reviews.text: Excellent detector, a little difficult to figure out for this novice metal head.
customer_reviews.author: mcoslet62

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely the best fit metal detector for me. Very sagisfied
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Barrick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Fathers Day gift and he loves it ! He had no hobbies and now he does. It will pick up everything. Still learning how to work everything!
customer_reviews.author: The Shopper

product_meta.title: Garrett AT MAX Waterproof Metal Detector, MS-3 Wireless Headphones and Pro-Pointer AT Z-Lynk Pinpointer
product_meta.description: Size:MS-3This Bundle Includes: Garrett AT Max Metal Detector, Garrett Pro-Pointer AT Z-Lynk enabled Pinpointer, MS-3 Wireless Headphones plus accessories. Includes: AT MAX Metal Detector * Z-Lynk enabled Pro-Pointer AT waterproof pinpointer * MS-3 Wireless Headphons *AT Max Cap * 8.5x11" DD Coil Cover * Garrett Warranty Card * AT Max Owner's Manual. The AT MAX features equals maximum performance: Built-in Z-Lynk Wireless Technology Cuts the cord! Integrated circuitry transmits audio to your wireless headphones. Six times faster than Bluetooth speed! Auto pairing. No cables, and no interference from other wireless devices. New Garrett MS-3 Z-Lynk Wireless Headphones included The speed of Z-Lynk Wireless Technology, and high-fidelity audio . . with no cords attached! Maximum Detection Depth Increased transmit power and enhanced electronics provides AT Max with significant depth increase. True All Metal Mode Detects all types of metal and provides the greatest possible detection depth and sensitivity. Backlight: Illuminates LCD screen for improved visibility in low-light situations. Optimized Frequency The AT Max 13.6 kHz operating frequency provides excellent detection on a wide range of targets—including silver coins, gold jewelry, and brass relics. High Resolution Ground Balance Automatic and manually adjustable for improved performance. Includes 175 points of Ground Balance resolution, allowing the AT Max to handle both conductive soils (such as saltwater beaches) and highly mineralized ground. Automatic Ground Balance Window Garrett Exclusive feature will simultaneously ground balance to a range of values to help overcome localized ground variations. By reducing subtle ground responses, the Automatic Ground Balance Window smooths detector audio and allows the user to hear faint targets. Larger Display Numbers: Digital Target ID number, Iron Discrimination number, etc. More Controls - All easily accessible with a single finger as you search.
feature_bullets: Enhanced Z-Lynk Pinpointer: Pro-Pointer All Terrain Z-Lynk Pinpointer integrates with the included MS-3 Headphones to hear sounds directly through your headphones
Wireless Z-Lynk MS-3 Headphones Included, Enhanced Detection Depth, True All-Metal Mode
LED Backlit Screen, Frequency 13.6 kHz, adjustable Ground Balance, Auto/Manual: High Resolution 175 pts Auto Ground Balance, Iron Audio, Iron Discrimination Segments: 44
Threshold Adjustment, Electronic Pinpointing, Waterproof to 10 feet (3m), Freshwater / Saltwater Search Modes, Digital Target ID, Audio Tone ID
Notch Discrimination, 8 Sensitivity Adjustments, Fast Recovery Speed, Target Depth ID, 8.5x 11" DD PROformance Coil

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars172 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
